title.rendered: How to Sign up to Threads | Top 2 Methods

content.rendered:
Threads, Meta’s alternative to Twitter, has been introduced and is now available. See how to sign up to Threads now and join discussions.

What is Threads

On July 6, Meta unveiled a newly launched standalone application that focuses on “sharing text updates and participating in public discussions,” as stated by Meta. This functionality closely resembles what Twitter used to provide before it underwent changes under the ownership and leadership of Elon Musk. These changes have been criticized for aggressively encouraging users to subscribe to the paid Twitter Blue service.

Developed by the Instagram team and integrated with users’ Instagram accounts, Threads permits posts with a maximum length of 500 characters. These posts can include various media elements such as links, photos, GIFs, and videos with a duration of up to five minutes.

Currently, Threads is accessible for download on iOS and Android devices in more than 100 countries. Within its initial seven hours, an astonishing estimated 10 million individuals purportedly registered for the service. If you wish to join this user base, here are the steps to Threads sign up.

Note:
if you Sign up for Threads account and subsequently decide to delete it, Meta will also delete your associated Instagram account. Additionally, as is customary with social media platforms, Meta tracks user activities extensively within Threads.

How to Sign up to Threads

How to Sign up to Threads | Top 2 Methods

To download Thread App, follow the steps below. All you need to do this is iPhone or Android, and Instagram login. Also learn How to Pick the Perfect Dell Computer for Your Needs

  1. Download the Threads app.
  2. Log in with Instagram.
  3. Create your profile.
  4. Decide whether you want your profile to be public or private.
  5. Follow accounts.
  6. Start text and participate in Conversation

Download the Threads App

On either your iPhone or Android, open the Google Play store or Apple Store on your phone. Search “Threads” and hit download. The app is free. (You can also find a direct link in your Instagram app — tap the three lines in the top right corner to open Settings, then click “Threads”, which will take you to your app store.)

Log in with Instagram

Log in with Instagram

When you open the Threads app, a button at the bottom of the screen will guide you to log in with your Instagram account. You can switch between Instagram accounts, choosing which one to use, if necessary.

Create your Thread Profile

Create your Thread Profile

From there, you’ll be asked to create a profile, with a picture, a bio, and the option to add links. You can also import your info from Instagram, so whatever is in your current Instagram profile automatically migrates to Threads.

Decide whether you want your profile to be public or private.

Decide whether you want your profile to be public or private.

Threads will then ask you to choose between public and private profiles. With a public account, anyone on or off Threads can see your content. If private, your account will only be available to approved followers.

Follow Accounts

Follow Accounts

You can either instantly follow all the accounts you already follow on Instagram, or choose who to follow manually. If you follow someone who isn’t on Threads yet, they’ll appear as “pending” until they’ve joined.

Start Text and Join Discussion

Your account is now ready to go. You can browse through the home page, follow more accounts, and post your own Threads. If your feed is full of accounts you don’t follow, you can change the settings using this guide.

In Summary

To sign up for Threads, follow these steps:

  1. Download the Threads app from the App Store (for iOS) or Google Play Store (for Android).
  2. Launch the app on your device.
  3. Tap on the “Sign Up” or “Create Account” button to begin the registration process.
  4. You will be prompted to provide your personal information, such as your name, email address, and phone number.
  5. Create a secure password for your Threads account.
  6. Agree to the terms of service and privacy policy, if prompted.
  7. Verify your account by following the verification steps, which may include entering a verification code sent to your email or phone number.
  8. Once your account is verified, you can customize your profile settings, including adding a profile picture and bio if desired.
  9. Start exploring Threads and connect with other users by sharing text updates and engaging in public conversations.

FAQ

Can I use Threads without an Instagram account?

No, Threads is directly linked to your Instagram account. You need an active Instagram account to use Threads.

Is Threads available for both iOS and Android?

Yes, Threads is available for both iOS and Android devices. You can download it from the respective app stores.

Can I share media like photos and videos on Threads?

Yes, Threads allows you to share various media elements such as photos, videos, GIFs, and links in your posts. The app supports photos and videos up to five minutes in length.

What happens if I delete my Threads account?

If you delete your Threads account, it will also result in the deletion of your associated Instagram account. Make sure to consider this before deleting your Threads account.

Is Threads free to use?

Yes, Threads is free to download and use. However, keep in mind that the app may include optional in-app purchases or advertisements.

How does Threads handle user privacy?

Threads, like other social media platforms, collects user data for various purposes. Make sure to review the app’s privacy policy to understand how your data is handled and what information is collected.
